chapters.title: Chapter 3: Friends and Enemies
chapters.info: Uno Nomesta, p. 25—A Shienaran officer, second in command to Ingtar. He is the one who gives orders to Masema. He is missing one eye, has a long scar across his face, and has a hairstyle like the typical Shienaran warrior—a topknot tied together and the rest of the head shaved clean. See also Dagar, Masema; Shinowa, Ingtar.
